title: Killers Amongst Us: Beautiful Blonde Mom Breaks into Politics, MURDERED! (part 3)
itunes:title: Killers Amongst Us: Beautiful Blonde Mom Breaks into Politics, MURDERED! (part 3)
description:
Linda Collins-Smith raises two children as a single mom, then meets a man and married. The match however was not made in Heaven and after 12 years, a bitter divorce ensues. Actions taken by her judge husband during the divorce result in him getting removed from the bench. Is that what leads to her death?

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
